verbs.description: south africa moves to [V: freeze] [ARG1: mckinsey gupta - linked assets] south africa national prosecuting authority will serve an order to freeze 1 6 billion rand 130 million of assets held by mckinsey co and trillian capital partners the first significant response to corruption allegations against the politically connected gupta family gupta linked assets eskom soc south african south africa trillian capital hawks guptas mckinsey company asset forfeiture unit eskom
